title: What is the meaning of learning to learn? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to be open to learning new things. Some people aren’t. They may find a way to do something and that is that. Not open to doing it a different way, not interested in learning a different method to achieve the same result, just keeping on doing the same thing for the same result. Or once they have heard something, that is it. Not interested in more information. Those people need to learn to learn.
